name: Transitional provision
text:
This chapter applies to proceedings begun on or after the effective date of this chapter to establish a support order or determine parentage of a child or to register, recognize, enforce, or modify a prior support order, determination, or agreement, whenever issued or entered. [L 1997, c 295, pt of §1; am L 2015, c 77, pt of §1]
 
Note
 
  The effective date of: (1) Act 295, Session Laws of Hawaii 1997, is July 1, 1997; and (2) Act 77, Session Laws of Hawaii 2015, is July 1, 2015.
